title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Cloud Modernization to Autonomous Enterprise: The Next Frontier (AIM344)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从云现代化到自主企业：下一个前沿 (AIM344)
abstract: Enterprises are moving beyond cloud migration toward a future defined AI-driven autonomy. This session explores why modernization across infrastructure, applications, and data is critical to unlock AI’s full potential. Panelists will share real-world examples of predictive, self-healing, and AI-orchestrated operations, and discuss the mindset shift required for CIOs and technology leaders to achieve success. Attendees will learn how cloud-native architectures, AI agents, and intelligent workflows are converging to create autonomous enterprises. By building modernization as the foundation, organizations can enhance efficiency, break down silos, and accelerate innovation, positioning themselves to thrive in an AI-powered future. This presentation is brought to you by Genpact, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 企业正在超越云迁移，迈向由AI驱动的自主化未来。本次会议探讨为什么跨基础设施、应用程序和数据的现代化对于释放AI的全部潜力至关重要。小组成员将分享预测性、自愈性和AI编排操作的真实案例，并讨论CIO和技术领导者实现成功所需的思维转变。与会者将了解云原生架构、AI代理和智能工作流如何融合创建自主企业。通过将现代化作为基础，组织可以提高效率、打破孤岛、加速创新，使自己在AI驱动的未来中蓬勃发展。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Genpact为您呈现。
